original_title: Metallica Presents: The Helping Hands Concert
overview: A live concert benefiting Metallica's All Within My Hands foundation. Hosted by Jimmy Kimmel and taking place at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles, the third edition of the Helping Hands Concert & Auction will open with a special set from guest Greta Van Fleet followed by a unique performance from Metallica.
tagline: Raising funds to support workforce education, the fight against hunger, and other critical local services.
title: Metallica Presents: The Helping Hands Concert
